title: Lakshmi Devi Devotional Finger Ring - A Touch of Divinity
materials: meticulously crafted with shimmering CZ stones
and Emerald highlights. Features a beautifully detailed Lakshmi Devi idol crafted in oxidized metal for contrast. Hyderabadi Polish provides a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite ring showcases a classic square temple design. At its heart lies the Lakshmi Devi motif, meticulously detailed and placed within an ornate filigree setting. The surrounding CZ stones are pave-set for maximum brilliance, while the rubies and emeralds add a touch of traditional South Indian color. The shank is designed for a comfortable fit, ensuring ease of wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant contrast of red (rubies)
and sparkling white (CZ stones). The Lakshmi Devi idol features a darker
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
and weddings. Also a beautiful and meaningful addition to everyday wear for the devout.
description: This ring seamlessly blends devotion with refined elegance. The intricate Lakshmi Devi design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece. Crafted with the highest quality materials and traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, this ring is not just a piece of jewelry, but a symbol of your faith and style.
